# Run an Orleans application

- [Use Consul as a membership provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/consul-deployment.md): Learn how to use Consul as a membership provider in .NET Orleans.
- [Deploy Orleans to Azure App Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/deploy-to-azure-app-service.md): Learn how to deploy an Orleans shopping cart app to Azure App Service.
- [Deploy Orleans to Azure Container Apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/deploy-to-azure-container-apps.md): Learn how to deploy an updated Orleans shopping cart app to Azure Container Apps.
- [Docker deployment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/docker-deployment.md): Learn how to deploy Orleans apps with Docker.
- [Failure handling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/handling-failures.md): Learn how to handle failures in Orleans apps.
- [Run an Orleans application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/index.md): Learn how to run an Orleans app in .NET.
- [Kubernetes hosting](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/kubernetes.md): Learn how to host an Orleans app with Kubernetes.
- [Host with Service Fabric](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/service-fabric.md): Learn how to host an Orleans app with Service Fabric.
- [Troubleshoot Azure Cloud Service deployments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/troubleshooting-azure-cloud-services-deployments.md): Learn how to troubleshoot an Orleans app deployed to Azure Cloud Services.
- [Troubleshoot deployments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/troubleshooting-deployments.md): Learn how to troubleshoot common Orleans deployment issues.
